name: MechWarrior Online: Black Hawk-Ku Mech Pack
summary: The Black Hawk-KU Mech Pack includes 2 New Variants Each with a standard Version and a Special Version with a 30% C-Bill Boost and Special Skin. Along with these 4 Mechs and Mech Bays we have included 3 extra omnipods for customization options, a title, badge, decal, and set of cockpit Items.
